verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) "Had it not <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> was on our side," Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%>
"Had it not <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7945>who<s%> was on our side, When <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> us;
<S%H233>Then<s%> they would have <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> us <S%H2416>alive,<s%> When their <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against us;
<S%H233>Then<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> would have <S%H7857>engulfed<s%> us, The <S%H5158>stream<s%> would have <S%H5674>swept<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> our <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7945>Who<s%> has not <S%H5414>given<s%> us to be <S%H2964>torn<s%> by their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H4422>escaped<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3369>trapper;<s%> The <S%H6341>snare<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%> and we have <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>
Our <S%H5828>help<s%> is in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
